title.rendered: His Excellency Yusuf Maitama Tuggar in the company of the Permanent Secretary MFA, Ambassador Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa, received in audience Honourable Abike Dabiri Erewa, Chairman/CEO of Nigerians in Diaspora Commission (NiDCOM)

content.rendered:
The Hon. Minister of Foreign Affairs, His Excellency Yusuf Maitama Tuggar in the company of the Permanent Secretary MFA, Ambassador Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa, received in audience Honourable Abike Dabiri Erewa, Chairman/CEO of Nigerians in Diaspora Commission (NiDCOM) & her delegation today, 29th August, 2023.
Discussions centered on enhancing collaboration between MFA and NiDCOM towards the realization of their respective mandates for the overall interest of the country.
